rdf:Description.dc:title: Agricultural statistics 1964
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Dept. of Agriculture. Statistics Branch.
Statistics Canada.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton : Alberta Agriculture, Statistics Branch in cooperation with Statistics Canada.
rdf:Description.dc:description: From <1976>-1991, issues are numbered #1 and #2 each year.
Issues for March 10, 1988 misnumbered #2, but constitutes #1.
Accompanied by occasional, unnumbered special releases called Cattle Special.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Cattle
rdf:Description.dc:relation: Number of cattle on farms in Alberta and Canada
